Info-rank plot

Source: vignettes/info-rank.Rmd
info-rank.Rmd

##TODO…

Introduction

data("Vaccine")
m <- bcea(e,c)
#> No reference selected. Defaulting to first intervention.
inp <- createInputs(vaccine, print_is_linear_comb = FALSE)
info.rank(m, inp)
info.rank(m, inp, graph = "base")

info.rank(m, inp, graph = "plotly")

A smaller number of the top variables can be selected using the howManyPars argument.

info.rank(m, inp, graph = "base", howManyPars = 10)

info.rank(m, inp, graph = "plotly", howManyPars = 10)
